column3: Latest;Koh Rong: On the evening of May 20
column5: there was a shooting on Koh Rong. ------Accounts on Facebook posted news that there was some sort of argument between a group of Chinese and Khmer people on the island
column6: and that the incident involved a son of a senior naval officer.------“This has happened and we are taking the matter to the court
column9: told the press on the evening of May 20.------“Police are seeking arrest warrants” he said. Full details and notifications will be released later. ------AREY
